attributes.action: Allow ex pats vaccinated in EU to arrive in uk without quarantine !
attributes.additional_details: It’s discriminatory that just because I was given the Pfizer vaccine in Spain , it counts for nothing because and nhs nurse didn’t give it to me - it’s the same vaccine !!!!!
attributes.background: Grant Schapps today announced that vaccinated arrivals in uk would not have to quarantine from amber countries . The issue is it only counts for people vaccinated by the NHS - meaning ex pats cannot arrive back in their home country without quarantine.
